description: Successively interleaved alternate bits in binary expansion of n gives vector of exponents in prime factorization of a(n).
comments: Every value appears once. Inverse of A059884. Similar to A052330 (they diverge at n=16) but assigns bits via interleaving versus numerical order.
links: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
author: _Marc LeBrun_, Feb 07 2001
